## madd variable

Multiply-add: a \* b + c. All must be of same type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
madd: <A extends "float" | "int" | "uint" | "vec2" | "vec3" | "vec4" | "ivec2" | "ivec3" | "ivec4" | "uvec2" | "uvec3" | "uvec4", B extends A, C extends B>(a: Term<A>, b: Term<B>, c: Term<C>) => Term<A>
```
